name: Mail Master
description: Mail Master is an email client application that supports all emails and multi-platform email real-time sychronizing. Meanwhile, it has intensively optimized the process of sending and receiving emails. It has less traffice loss, better operation experience and faster receiving speed!

zh_CN.description: 网易邮箱大师是一款邮箱客户端应用，它支持所有邮箱的使用，能够实现多平台邮件实时同步；同时对邮箱的收发信等流程做了大量的优化，流量损耗更少，操作体验更舒畅，收信速度更快！
zh_CN.name: 网易邮箱大师
